New Records: Cape Verde scored seven goals in the 2023 AFCON, more than in previous tournaments.
Mauritania reached their first ever AFCON knockout stage.
Key Match Events: Cape Verde and Mauritania have never met at AFCON before; their last encounter was in 2019 in the African Nations Championship, where Mauritania won 2-1.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde are slight favorites with a 56.3% win rate in simulations, while Mauritania have only a 22.1% chance.
Both teams have defied low pre-tournament expectations.
Post-Match Reflections: The winner will be seen as a significant achievement given their low initial chances in the tournament.
